name: Building Builder (working title)
description:
Building Builder

=============

Project Summary:

In Building Builder you build buildings.
As you build, your island expands, letting you build bigger, better, more boastful buildings.

Controls:

Mouse:
  Left mouse button: Click and drag to construct
  Right mouse button: Rotate view
  Scrollwheel: Zoom

Spacebar:
  Summon a wrecking ball

Escape:
  Quit
